easy.title: The Empty House
easy.question: The more you take out of me, the bigger I become. What am I?

medium.title: The Family Riddle
medium.question: A man is looking at a picture of someone. His friend asks, 'Who is it you're looking at?' He replies, 'Brothers and sisters, I have none. But that man's father is my father's son.' Who is the man in the photo?
